headline.main: EXTEND DRUG LAW TO GUARD THE POOR; Provisions Against Cocaine and Morphine Needed for Unscrupulous Dealers, Bensel Says.

docs.abstract: Supt W Bensel explains Health Dept extension of ordinances against sale of cocaine to include morphine; says there is danger of promiscuous use fostered by unscrupulous druggists
docs.snippet: Supt W Bensel explains Health Dept extension of ordinances against sale of cocaine to include morphine; says there is danger of promiscuous use fostered by unscrupulous druggists
